Text.Language: Afi~ n~je P[oic sa B/ya~nia: nem nefmay/t/c eyouab: affai n~nefjij afc~mou e~rwou: afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui.
The Lord came to Bethany / with His holy disciples. / He raised His hands and blessed them / He ascended into the heavens.

}'u,/ n~]c~himi n~camarit/c: y/e~tacjimi n~oumwou n~wnq: ecc~mou e~rok je c,/ qatotk: n~je ]moumi m~mwou n~te p~wnq.
The soul of the Samaritan woman / who found living water / blesses You because with You / is the water of the fountain of life.

Marenouwst m~Pencwt/r: pimairwmi n~a~gayoc: je n~yof afsenh/t qaron: afi~ ouoh afcw] m~mon.
Let us worship our Savior, the Good One and Lover of Mankind, for He had compassion on us and has come and saved us.

Wouniatou qen oumeym/i: n/eyouab n~te paie~hoou: piouai piouai kata pefran: nimenra] n~te Pi,~rictoc.
Blessed are they in truth, the saints of this day, each one according to his name, the beloved of Christ.
